OOC: Rdahl, the damage done to Quatro here is the least I can do after I le=
ft you no chance to respond to all my actions.

::Slaughter/Quatro::

     =
Slaughter was just about to cram Squawktalk into his mouth, when he felt su=
dden pain.  His pincir let go of Squawktalk, and then he roared a loud roar=
.  His mind was taken off of Squawktalk, and he stared at Cepta.  Hmm.  Thi=
s bot was bigger than the metallic bird, and might make an even better meal=
.  Squawktalk might make a good dessert, anyway.  Slaughter just stood ther=
e for literally 5 minutes(if that's okay with you guys), slime constantly d=
ripping from his body.  Then, Slaughter took his right pincir and tried to =
grab Cepta by the neck.
